# Adtelligent

## Examples

### For DSP/SSP Clients

```
<amp-ad width="300" height="250"
    type="adtelligent"
    data-source="350975">
</amp-ad>
```

### For HBMP Clients

```
<amp-ad width="300" height="250"
    type="adtelligent"
    data-hbmp-site-id="29"
    data-hbmp-pub-id="269911"
    data-hbmp-unit-id="58">
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

### Required parameters

For DSP/SSP clients

-   `data-source`

For HBMP clients

-   `data-hbmp-site-id`
-   `data-hbmp-pub-id`
-   `data-hbmp-unit-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-floor`
